A successful demonstration of the Zeolite-X synthesis process at a 15 kg batch scale was conducted for NALCO (National Aluminium Company Limited).
A joyful celebration of Raksha Bandhan with lab members, cherishing the spirit of unity, respect, and camaraderie in our research family.
Dr. Sethia shared key insights on the design and application of porous materials during his presentation at the prestigious Advanced Materials Congress in Jodhpur.
A cheerful celebration with the team as we marked Harshal’s birthday in the lab — a moment of joy, cake, and camaraderie amidst our research work.
A delightful evening spent with our guide and their family — sharing good food, meaningful conversations, and cherished moments beyond the lab.
A joyful celebration filled with laughter, good wishes, and sweet moments as we celebrated Chandresh’s birthday with the team.
